website_summaries.verdict: A spectacular treat is waiting for sandal-loving trail travelers who would opt for the Hurricane 4 by Teva. Indeed, hikers who would give this true-to-size shoe a chance are destined to discover how immensely comfortable (on day-one), supportive, and beautifully crafted it is. Unfortunately, the sandal still comes with a handful of flaws, arguably the most unamusing of which is the clunkiness of its forefoot zone. To sum up, the Hurricane 4 is yet another delightful Teva gear whose excellence on many fronts overshadows its few criticisms.
pros: Scores of verified purchasers spoke quite highly of their Teva Hurricane 4 sandals in the comfort department
Its arch support was considered outstanding by a host of wearers
Based on numerous reviews, this strappy Teva hiker runs true to size
The sandal, especially the Teva Hurricane 4 (women’s version), was praised for having a super-stylish design from top to bottom
Quite a number of owners swore by the minimal break-in period of this hiking footgear
Some users deeply adored its unbelievable lightness above all else
The Teva men’s Hurricane 4 impressed several male hikers with its long-lasting build quality
This amphibious hiking sandal was admired through the roof by a small group of testers for having incredibly adjustable straps
cons: About a handful of patrons found the sandal too wide, especially around the toe region
Its inability to fight off stink was enough to disappoint a couple of consumers
A very tiny percentage of reviewers complained about the sandal’s sweat-inducing footbed
An owner didn’t appreciate the weird sensation she got from one of its triangular buckles

customer_reviews.title: stand up to a lot of walking
customer_reviews.text: We have annual passes to Disney World and by the end of the day, our legs and feet are in pain. It's basically because we are standing/walking on concrete for 12 hours. These were a gift for my hubs who stated his legs and feet feel wonderful after a full day. I will need to get myself a pair. They fit true to size as well so no issues with having to exchange or return and the straps are adjustable to deal with any swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy shoes or sandals about 1 size too large because I have unusually wide feet, so these are a bit too long in the heel but otherwise they fit me perfectly. The really great thing is all three straps are adjustable - toe, instep, and heel. I have never seen a sandal made like that before, and I'm delighted with the total adjustability of them! In addition they have very thick and tough soles and wonderful arch supports, which are missing in most sandals I have had. I'm delighted with this product and will eventually re-order.
customer_reviews.author: WayneWarmack

customer_reviews.title: My teenage son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These Tevas are terrific! I bought them for my 13-year old to wear on our vacation to the beach, and he loves them. They are well-made, supportive, and haven't rubbed a single blister on my son's feet, even when he first wore them. He has used them in and out of the water, while biking, on hikes, and just around town, and they are great! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd or 3rd pair, I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these sandals about 9 months out of the year on a daily basis, so I've worn our several pair over the last decade or so. They are comfortable and quick to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems OK
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. The first pair of Teva's lasted around 15 years, although they were not worn on a daily basis and required a bit of glue after about 10 year. I do tend to wear them with socks, and find a blister develops on the top of the big toe without the socks - but I am also old and thin skinned so might be fine for the younger generation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are backup for a working sandal. As in the past, quality seems fine. Usually get 2years of constant use out of a pair. Second year usually have to sew new Velcro on heal strap. Sandal is retired once sole delaminates. (Side note: Select a sandal with firm sole arching up at the toes else can easily trip.)
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Second buyer bliss!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Teva’s for my guy who is extremely picky and hard to shop for! He loves them! They were a return I guess because they were discounted a great deal; never buying like this before I had my reservation...I shouldn’t have doubted Amazon! They are perfect! Nothing wrong that we could find well one thread stuck out on the heel!😱lol I put a flame to it for a hot second and gone! They are brand new and I’m throughly impressed!!! Thank you Amazon and thank you unsatisfied customer number one because your lose is our gain!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice candles
customer_reviews.text: These Teva's are very light and comfortable. Platform (inner sole and outer sole) is supportive and good for walking almost any distance. These sandals tolerate walking on wet grass or pavement with puddles. Took a few days to get used to because the inside strap connection to the platform is next to your heel instead of at the arch where I would expect it.
customer_reviews.author: NoHairPapa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these constantly. Comfortable and great for running. I have done 10ks I them and felt great. Only down side is that they need to be washed nearly daily. The smell gets pretty rough.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Monger

customer_reviews.title: Flat sole
customer_reviews.text: My husband ended up liking the Sanborn style over these because he said these were a little too "flat-footed" for him. Seemed like a nice sandal overall though.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and sturdy. Only wore them 3 times now, but happy. However, I am glad a read various reviews, becasue they said the size runs big. I wear an 8 1/2, so I ordered an 8. Glad I did, it is a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn Tevas for years but his old ones were wearing and needed to be replaced. His new ones fit him perfectly and I love the colors because they go with anything. He is a happy man now.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie L. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing these all the time. Looks may not be the best, but comfort and use is top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Safeplay

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of these Tevas. I wish they were cheaper. They are perfect wearing to the lake for watersports or when I go kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: TNriver

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfort. No difference from the past. I’d highly recommend these sandals. Wish the bottoms lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in WA

customer_reviews.title: Will they last?
customer_reviews.text: Hope they last as long as the last pair I had, four years of daily use three months a year. Not confident, lesser material, but I remain hopeful. I'll let you know in 2022...
customer_reviews.author: Gregory  O

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Sandals
customer_reviews.text: High recommend. Comfortable and durable. TEVAs are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are comfortable and feel great on my feet and appear to be made of high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: G Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable type of footwear..
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to estimate size.. I normally wear 10 1/2 ..Tried 11, was too big, so ordered 10. Fits OK..!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, personally I like Teva LESS than Chacos
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes them! Good Quality, personally I like Teva LESS than Chacos.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for every day wear AND hiking
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes, the tread on the bottom and the high arch make them sturdy and super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Sydnie

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I had for two weeks the stitching came undone on the right support strap from the heel to the toes. Really disappointed in the quality of the stitch I guess I expected more from Teva.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: teva
customer_reviews.text: I order another pair of Teva but they were the wrong size. I would like to return them but can not find out how. If you can help please. The shoes are great Ray
customer_reviews.author: RAY G.

customer_reviews.title: Run big, but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Took them hiking around Kauai. I wear size 11 normally but the size 11 on these were too big. I had to exchange them for a size 10 which fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Teva, as always, a quality product. good fit , well made.
customer_reviews.author: mwgkop2hop

customer_reviews.title: as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been a user of Teva and he has not disappointed me
customer_reviews.author: fabiovel

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Been using it almost everyday and I love it! Great buy and already thinking of buying another one :)
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Solid sport sandal.
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my boat, also for the beach and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore them all summer and I expect to wear them next summer. Minimal wear, walked several miles every day and more in them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first generation Tevas in 1985. They were indestructible. The sole to this version unglued in a matter of months. I reglued it several times but finally gave up and through them out. So disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Oshaughnessy

product_meta.title: Teva Men's M Hurricane 4 Sport Sandal
product_meta.description: The Hurricane 4 is the perfect option for those who want a down 'n dirty, tough 'n tumble, rough 'n rugged sandal that can handle it all. Great for use on the trails or in the water, you won't be disappointed with this sport sandal.
feature_bullets: Nylon shank stabilizes and supports your foot on uneven terrain
Rugged Durabrasion Rubber outsole is extremely durable and supplies great traction
